sourcesContent:
export const CommonVariables = {
  borderRadius: "5px",
  borderWidth: "1px",
  paddingV: "14px",
  paddingH: "16px",
  inputLineHeight: "22px",
  labelTranslateY: "-9px",
  labelScale: "0.68",
  errorBorderWidth: "2px"
};

export const CommonColors = {
  border: "#A2A5AF",
  activeBorder: "#000000",
  disabledBg: "#f4f5f6",
  disabledBorder: "#dee2e7",
  text: "#323232",
  bg: "#fff",
  hoverBg: "#f2f5f6",
  focusShadow: "#66afe9",
  labelText: "#454B60",
  labelDisabled: "#707070",
  errorBorder: "#DD2727",
  errorText: "#DD2727",
  formInput: "#454B60"
};
